last_episode_to_air.name: Lights, Camera... Cavey!
last_episode_to_air.overview: While on a tour of the movie studio, a Phantom makes two actresses appear old. Captain Caveman and the Teen Angels investigate.

name: Captain Caveman and the Teen Angels
original_name: Captain Caveman and the Teen Angels
overview:
Captain Caveman and the Teen Angels is an animated series created by Joe Ruby and Ken Spears and produced by Hanna-Barbera Productions from September 10, 1977 to June 21, 1980 on ABC.

The first and second seasons were originally broadcast as segments on the package shows Scooby's All-Star Laff-A-Lympics and Scooby's All-Stars from 1977 to 1979 and the third season featured Captain Caveman and the Teen Angels in their own half-hour timeslot in 1980.

episodes.name: The Kooky Case of the Cryptic Keys
episodes.overview: While on a road trip, Captain Caveman and the Teen Angels are given a mysterious key by a stranger.

episodes.name: The Mixed Up Mystery of Deadman's Reef
episodes.overview: While at the beach with some friends, Captain Caveman and the Teen Angels see a ship mysteriously vanish.

episodes.name: What a Flight for a Fright
episodes.overview: At the airport, some jewels are stolen by a mysterious figure.

episodes.name: The Creepy Case of the Creaky Charter Boat
episodes.overview: On a charter boat, Captain Caveman and the Teen Angels are chatting with a friend whose father is being honored for his role in a play when suddenly the lights go out and a necklace is stolen.

episodes.name: Big Scare in the Big Top
episodes.overview: At the circus, tigers are disappearing. Captain Caveman and the Teen Angels investigate and discover a phantom has been haunting the circus.

episodes.name: Double Dribble Riddle
episodes.overview: The Central City Kings have disappeared due to a panther.

episodes.name: The Crazy Case of the Tell-Tale Tape
episodes.overview: The television station, KXXX, is taken off the air when a criminal cuts the antenna.

episodes.name: The Creepy Claw Caper
episodes.overview: A villain named Claw uses an aging gun to turn a rock star into an old man.

episodes.name: Cavey and the Kabuta Clue
episodes.overview: When a mummy comes to life and kidnaps an archeologist, Captain Caveman and the Teen Angels investigate.

episodes.name: Cavey and the Weirdo Wolfman
episodes.overview: With their friend, a prince of a small country, Captain Caveman and the Teen Angels go skiing. When the scepter is stolen by a Snowwolfman, they investigate.

episodes.name: The Disappearing Elephant Mystery
episodes.overview: In India, when a Royal White Elephant is stolen by an evil sorcerer, Captain Caveman and the Teen Angels investigate.

episodes.name: The Fur Freight Fright
episodes.overview: Captain Caveman and the Teen Angels are assisting Dee Dee's uncle, Frank Skyes, with a fur delivery. When the furs disappear, it is up to them to find out what happened.

episodes.name: Ride 'Em Caveman
episodes.overview: In Wyoming, rumors of a horse that is possessed by a demon are rampant. And they seem to be true. Captain Caveman and the Teen Angels have arrived to investigate. Just as they are investigating, a bank robbery occurs.

episodes.name: The Strange Case of the Creature from Space
episodes.overview: Captain Caveman and the Teen Angels go to a research facility after they spot an alien spacecraft landing there. They discover that an alien robot supposedly stole a top secret energy source.

episodes.name: The Mystery Mansion Mix-Up
episodes.overview: Captain Caveman and the Teen Angels got to Farthington Mansion with Taffy's Aunt Gladys to see a magic show. When some jewels are stolen, Captain Caveman and the Teen Angels investigate.

episodes.name: Playing Footsie with Bigfoot
episodes.overview: In Oregon, when the star athlete of a sports team is kidnapped, Captain Caveman and the Teen Angels investigate. Very soon, they have found Juice Brenner. Or have they? He is acting strangely.

episodes.name: Disco Cavey
episodes.overview: When jewels are stolen at a disco on the RMS Queen Mary, Captain Caveman and the Teen Angels investigate. The creepy monster seems to have the Teen Angels outfoxed.

episodes.name: Muscle-Bound Cavey
episodes.overview: When a champion wrestler is kidnapped, Captain Caveman and the Teen Angels investigate.

episodes.name: Cavey's Crazy Car Caper
episodes.overview: When a new car is stolen, Captain Caveman and the Teen Angels investigate.

episodes.name: Cavey's Mexicali 500
episodes.overview: When four Aztec calendars are stolen, Captain Caveman and the Teen Angels decide to investigate.

episodes.name: Wild West Cavey
episodes.overview: While at a Wild West show in Dodge City, some money disappears from a saddle bag that two bandits who were really actors pretended to steal from a stagecoach that Captain Caveman and the Teen Angels were riding.

episodes.name: Cavey's Winter Carnival Caper
episodes.overview: Captain Caveman and the Teen Angels investigate when their friend, figure skater Karenia Mikovich, disappears.

episodes.name: Cavey's Fashion Fiasco
episodes.overview: At a fashion show, three models disappear.

episodes.name: Cavey's Missing Missile Miss-tery
episodes.overview: Captain Caveman and the Teen Angels decide to investigate when a missile launch they have been watching in the Grand Canyon, where they had previously competed in the Laff-A-Lympics, goes awry.

episodes.name: The Scarifying Seaweed Secret
episodes.overview: Ms. Snowden is supposed to be the heir to a fortune. But she must stay on the island, or her relatives will inherit the fortune. Captain Caveman and the Teen Angels are called in to investigate when the relatives start disappearing thanks to a mysterious sea creature.

episodes.name: The Dummy
episodes.overview: The gang tries to uncover the truth behind the theft of a ventriloquist's dummy.

episodes.name: Cavey and the Volcanic Villain
episodes.overview: In Hawaii, a marriage between two lovers from two families who had been enemies for many years is threatened when a sacred pearl disappears. Captain Caveman and the Teen Angels, who are friends with the bride, investigate.

episodes.name: Prehistoric Panic
episodes.overview: Captain Caveman and the Teen Angels travel back in time to meet Captain Caveman's father, the chief of Cavey's tribe. Cavey soon learns that his father's position is threatened by the Mellog, an evil creature that Captain Caveman's father defeated long ago. Captain Caveman and the Teen Angels investigate when the statue of the Mellog comes to life.

episodes.name: Cavey and the Baffling Buffalo Man
episodes.overview: A Native American park ranger asks Captain Caveman and the Teen Angels for their help in finding his stolen car and the Buffalo Man who stole it.

episodes.name: Dragonhead
episodes.overview: While on the way to a Chinese New Year festival in San Francisco, Captain Caveman and the Teen Angels save a truck driver working for a fortune cookie factory. The CEO, Mr. Chin, has been having problems with his business since a masked criminal named Dragonhead showed up. Captain Caveman finds the truck. They notice that the fortune cookies were stolen but not the fortunes. Captain Caveman and the Teen Angels investigate.

episodes.name: Cavey and the Murky Mississippi Mystery
episodes.overview: Captain Caveman and the Teen Angels go on a cruise on a riverboat on the Mississippi River. While there, some nuclear material disappears in the river. Captain Caveman and the Teen Angels investigate and discover a river creature.

episodes.name: Old Cavey in New York
episodes.overview: In New York City, Captain Caveman and the Teen Angels witness a blackout. They soon discover that the gold from the International Gold Exchange has been stolen at the same time.

episodes.name: Cavey and the Albino Rhino
episodes.overview: Captain Caveman and the Teen Angels are the first people to see a rare albino rhino at the wildlife park. A little while later, the albino rhino is stolen.

episodes.name: Kentucky Cavey
episodes.overview: Taffy Dare wants to help her uncle who is on the verge of a foreclosure unless his horse wins the Kentucky Derby. When the horse is stolen, Captain Caveman and the Teen Angels investigate.

episodes.name: Cavey Goes to College
episodes.overview: The Angels investigate the theft of a super-intelligent robot.

episodes.name: The Haunting of Hog's Hollow
episodes.overview: At the Hog Hollow Country Fair, something is wrong with country music singer Jasper Joe Jeeter's voice. Captain Caveman and the Teen Angels investigate when Jasper disappears on a ferris wheel.

episodes.name: The Legend of Devil's Run
episodes.overview: Dee Dee's uncle, Winton, invites Captain Caveman and the Teen Angels to see the reopening of the Devil's Run Railway when a freight car full of silver disappears the same way a munitions car disappeared during the Civil War. Captain Caveman and the Teen Angels investigate and find out that the legend of the Civil War ghost said to have pulled off the robbery.

episodes.name: The Mystery of the Meandering Mummy
episodes.overview: When a mummy comes to life and steals an Ancient Egyptian ruby from Brenda's uncle, Jonathan, Captain Caveman and the Teen Angels investigate.

episodes.name: The Old Caveman and the Sea
episodes.overview: While on vacation in Miami, Captain Caveman and the Teen Angels witness a shark attack. They soon discover that a treasure has been stolen. Captain Caveman and the Teen Angels investigate.

episodes.name: Lights, Camera... Cavey!
episodes.overview: While on a tour of the movie studio, a Phantom makes two actresses appear old. Captain Caveman and the Teen Angels investigate.
